MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 15-DEC-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12pm to safely transfer customers onto a new mains cable near to Pitcox Lodge substation following a underground cable fault previously and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:26 AM on Tuesday, 15 December 2020.
